comment.author: 36645048@N00
comment._content: He is wearing the breast star of the Japanese Order of the Sacred Treasure, presumably during a state visit.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: His wikipedia entries have lists of his decorations. "Felix Graf von Bothmer (10 December 1852 – 18 March 1937) was a German general during the Brusilov offensive of 1916." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felix_Graf_von_Bothmer More at: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felix_Graf_von_Bothmer

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks again, artolog, for helping us improve our catalog by providing a reference for the full name and dates. We appreciate it!
